result.eng: I visited my aunt in New York.
result.ga: thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i nua-eabhrac

result.ponchtml: ṫug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i nua-eaḃracI visited my aunt in New York.

result.eng: We [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ga: bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i woodlawn agus i manhattan nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i woodlawn agus i manhattan nua-eabhrac
result.html: bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i woodlawn agus i manhattan nua-eabhracWe [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.

result.eng: I live in New Jersey next to New York.
result.ga: tá mé i mo chónaí i nua-gheirsí in aice le nua-eabhrac
result.orig: tá mé i mo chónaí i nua-gheirsí in aice le nua-eabhrac
result.html: tá mé i mo chónaí i nua-gheirsí in aice le nua-eabhracI live in New Jersey next to New York.
result.ponchtml: tá mé i mo ċónaí i nua-ġeirsí in aice le nua-eaḃracI live in New Jersey next to New York.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i nua-eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am nua-eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i nua-eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am nua-eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i nua-eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am nua-eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i nua-eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am nua-eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: I'm from New York but I live in Cork now.

result.orig: as nua-eabhrac mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí i gcorcaigh anois
result.html: as nua-eabhrac mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí i gcorcaigh anoisI'm from New York but I live in Cork now.
result.ponchtml: as nua-eaḃrac mé aċ tá mé i mo ċónaí i gcorcaiġ anoisI'm from New York but I live in Cork now.

result.eng: I'm originally from New York in the United States.
result.ga: as nua-eabhrac sna stáit aontaithe ó dhúchas mé

result.ponchtml: as nua-eaḃrac sna stáit aontaiṫe ó ḋúċas méI'm originally from New York in the United States.

result.eng: She was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ga: bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gcathair nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gcathair nua-eabhrac

result.ponchtml: ḃí sí an-ġníoṁaċ i saol na hiriseoireaċta i gcaṫair nua-eaḃracShe was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.html: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i nua-eaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i nua-eabhrac
result.html: bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i nua-eabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i nua-eaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: While there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ga: agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i nua-eabhrac
result.html: agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i nua-eabhracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ponchtml: agus scamaill duḃa ag plúċaḋ amaċ as na túir i nua-eaḃracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i nua-eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: anseo i nua-eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: anseo i nua-eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite

result.ponchtml: anseo i nua-eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
